com.lift.game.controller.powerups

Interface PowerUp

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicPowerUP, CoinPU, LifePU, NullPU, TimedPowerUp, VelocityPU

    public interface PowerUp
    Interface for power ups to use.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disappear(GameController gameController)
      To run when the power up disappears.
      PowerUpState getPowerUpState()
      State of the power up.
      boolean pickup(GameController gameController)
      Runs when a power up is picked.
      void setPowerUpState(PowerUpState powerUpState)
      Changes the state of the power up.
      boolean update(GameController gameController, float delta)
      Updates a power ups stats.

    • Method Detail

      • pickup

        boolean pickup(GameController gameController)
        Runs when a power up is picked.
        Parameters:
        gameController - Controller to be manipulated.
        Returns:
        True if the action was successful.

      • update

        boolean update(GameController gameController,
               float delta)
        Updates a power ups stats.
        Parameters:
        gameController - Controller to act upon.
        delta - Time since the last update.
        Returns:
        True when the power up is finished.

      • disappear

        void disappear(GameController gameController)
        To run when the power up disappears.
        Parameters:
        gameController - Controller to be manipulated.

      • getPowerUpState

        PowerUpState getPowerUpState()
        State of the power up.
        Returns:
        Returns the state of the power up.

      • setPowerUpState

        void setPowerUpState(PowerUpState powerUpState)
        Changes the state of the power up.
        Parameters:
        powerUpState - New value for the power up state.
